dct_title_s: Carte de l'Isle de Madagascar, dite aujourd'hui l'Ile Daufine
dct_description_sm: Relief shown pictorially. Map is surrounded by 11 vignettes of the dress and manners of the inhabitants, and by text: De l'Ile de Madagascar; Des peuples de l'Ile de Madagascar. From: Atlas historique, ou, Nouvelle introduction à l'histoire ... / Henri Abraham Châtelain. Amsterdam, 1705-1720 -- Tom. VI, no. 34, p. 142.
